column4: Can anyone help me? I'm trying to install Call Of Duty 1. But under the installation it asks me to insert CD 2. But I can't take out CD 1 as the system won't allow it :S
Can anyone help me? I'm trying to install Call Of Duty 1. But under the installation it asks me to insert CD 2. But I can't take out CD 1 as the system won't allow it. Can anyone help me please?
too bad... i really don't know then
